item.title: Riverlands, Abandoned Wastes
item.description: Riverlands Abandoned Wastes Region OverWorld Rarity Common Initiative Fewest Elements   After the defeat of Aa’une, the remaining M’arrillians fled to the Doors of the Deepmines leaving all damage caused behind. The Riverlands became an ugly and desolated place… But in a collective effort, as seen during the events of Elementary, Rellim, the Riverlands’ Caretaker, Hune Canin, Najarin, Garv, Caretaker of Lake Morn and the Servant of Water, Unda, in an apparent visit to the OverWorld, succeeded in destroying all of M’arrillians’ dams and, the most important, purified the water so life could once again return to the region.

item.title: Wamma, Flame Guard
item.description: Rarity Energy Mugicians Common 50 1         70 65 40 25 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 7'4.5"Weight 702 lbsEyes Cornflower Blue Skin Dark-orange Persimmon Loyalty Danians   With the ascension of Aszil, the Young Queen to the Danian throne after the abdication of his mother, Queen Illexia, while on an expedition for territorial expansion northwards, the Danians unintentionally excavated the Tremor Gate in the vicinities of Silchaw’s Mine.

item.title: Zhade
item.description: Zhade is a Mipedian Stalker and an infiltrator agent of his Tribe

item.title: Zhade, Dig Site Defender
item.description: Rarity Energy Mugicians Common 45 1         65 45 30 95 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 6'Weight 215 lbsEyes Medium-Blue Skin Golden Brown (skin) Fire-brick Red (frill) Goldenrod Flower Yellow (horns) Loyalty Mipedians   Zhade makes sure that those spies unfortunate enough to learn what was unearthed never report their findings
